Plot: A princess, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.
Title: Enchanted
Actors: Amy Adams, Patrick Dempsey, James Marsden, Timothy Spall
tomatoConsensus: A smart re-imagining of fairy tale tropes that's sure to delight children and adults, Enchanted features witty dialogue, sharp animation, and a star turn by Amy Adams.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 47 nominations.
